thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com | 5 of 171
thread.title: Megan Sullivan

author: Megan Sullivan
title: Megan Sullivan
text:
We've been TrustedHousitters users for almost a year now and have had extremely positive experience with the sitters we've found on the site. Perhaps our location in NYC makes it easy but we have always had dozens of applicants when we post an opening.
My only qualm is that the website is not built with any robust search functionality and lacks basic UX design that would reduce frustration when perusing open sits or looking for available sitters. There should be a sort function, the filters often aren't accurate (especially when looking for specific time periods), and the dashboard is not intuitive.
